phrase.original: PhotoDemon would not be possible without contributions from the following individuals and organizations
phrase.translation: PhotoDemon wäre ohne den folgenden Personen möglich. Mein aufrichtiger Dank geht an

phrase.original: PhotoDemon uses several third-party plugins. These plugins may be governed by additional licenses. For more information, please visit
Please load an image. (The large 'Open Image' button at the top-left should do the trick!)
All systems go! Launching main window

phrase.translation: Stellen Sie sicher, dass Datei existiert

phrase.original: File not found (%1). Image load canceled.

Unfortunately, the image '%1' could not be found.
If this image was originally located on removable media (DVD, USB drive, etc), please re-insert or re-attach the media and try again.
FreeImage refused to load image. Dropping back to GDI+ and trying again
GDI+ refused to load image. Dropping back to internal routines and trying again

Unfortunately, PhotoDemon was unable to load the following image:
%1
Please use another program to save this image in a generic format (such as JPEG or PNG) before loading it into PhotoDemon. Thanks!
Alpha channel deemed unnecessary. Converting image to 24bpp
phrase.translation: Alpha-Kanal wird nicht für notwendig erachtet. Wandelt Bilder ins 24bpp

phrase.original: Alpha channel verified. Leaving image in 32bpp mode.
Alpha channel validation ignored at user's request.
phrase.translation: Alpha Kanal Validierung ignoriert auf Anforderung des Benutzers.

phrase.original: Color count successful (%1 BPP, indexed color)

phrase.translation: Stellen Sie die Bildgröße auf dem Bildschirm passen

phrase.original: All images loaded, except for those that could not be found.

Unfortunately, PhotoDemon was unable to find the following image(s):
%1
If these images were originally located on removable media (DVD, USB drive, etc), please re-insert or re-attach the media and try again.
All images loaded, except for those in invalid formats.

Unfortunately, PhotoDemon was unable to load the following image(s):
%1
Please use another program to save these images in a generic format (such as JPEG or PNG) before loading them into PhotoDemon. Thanks!
Copying plugin files to new \Data\Plugins subdirectory
%1 save failed (FreeImage_SaveEx silent fail). Please report this error using Help -> Submit Bug Report.
%1 save failed (FreeImage returned blank handle). Please report this error using Help -> Submit Bug Report.

The FreeImage interface plug-in (FreeImage.dll) was marked as missing or disabled upon program initialization.
To enable support for this image format, please copy the FreeImage.dll file (downloadable from http://freeimage.sourceforge.net/download.html) into the plug-in directory and reload the program.
Save could not be completed without FreeImage library access.
phrase.translation: Speichern kann nicht ohne Free Image-Bibliothek Zugriff abgeschlossen sein.

phrase.original: Save cannot be completed without FreeImage library.
Using the pngnq-s9 plugin to write a high-quality 8bpp PNG file. This may take a moment
Pngnq-s9 could not write file. Saving 32bpp image instead
PPM save failed (FreeImage_SaveEx silent fail). Please report this error using Help -> Submit Bug Report.
No color found. Saving 8bpp grayscale JPEG.
Note: due to missing plugins, some options on this page have been disabled
Maximum # of colors with these parameters
Quantizing image using the FreeImage library
phrase.translation: Quantisierung des Bildes mit Hilfe der FreeImage Bibliothek

phrase.original: Image successfully quantized to %1 unique colors.

The FreeImage interface plug-ins (FreeImage.dll) was marked as missing or disabled upon program initialization.
To enable support for this feature, please copy the FreeImage.dll file into the plug-in directory and reload the program.
Applying manual RGB modifications to image
phrase.translation: Anpassungen Bildes mit Verwendung eines manuellen RGB

phrase.original: Original color depth of %1 bpp is supported by this format. Proceeding with save
Original color depth of %1 bpp is not supported by this format. Proceeding to save as %2 bpp
Counting image colors to determine optimal exported color depth
Recommended color depth of %1 bpp is supported by this format. Proceeding with save
Recommended color depth of %1 bpp is not supported by this format. Proceeding to save as %2 bpp

The zLib compression library (zlibwapi.dll) was marked as missing or disabled upon program initialization.
To enable PDI saving, please allow %1 to download plugin updates by going to the Tools -> Options menu, and selecting the 'offer to download core plugins' check box.
Output format not recognized. Save aborted. Please use the Help -> Submit Bug Report menu item to report this incident.

phrase.translation: Daten aus der Zwischenablage erfolgreich importiert

phrase.original: URL found on clipboard. Attempting to download image at that location
phrase.translation: URL gefunden in Zwischenablage. Der Versuch, an dieser Stelle herunterladen

phrase.original: Image download failed. Please copy a valid image URL to the clipboard and try again.
The clipboard is empty or it does not contain a valid picture format. Please copy a valid image onto the clipboard and try again.
phrase.translation: Die Zwischenablage ist leer oder enthält keine gültigen Format.

phrase.original: Resampling image using the FreeImage plugin
Would you like to minimize PhotoDemon before capturing the screen?
sample image for true contrast (slower but more accurate)
phrase.translation: Beispiel für die reale Kontrast (langsamer, aber genauer)

phrase.original: Sampling image data to determine true contrast
phrase.translation: Abtasten von Bilddaten, die wirkliche Unterschied bestimmenGegensatz

phrase.original: There is not enough memory available to continue this operation. Please free up system memory (RAM) and try again. If the problem persists, reduce the zoom value and try again.
Viewport rendering paused due to unexpected error (#%1)

There is not enough memory available to continue this operation. Please free up system memory (RAM) by shutting down unneeded programs - especially your web browser, if it is open - then try the action again.

Unfortunately, this image file appears to be invalid. This can happen if a file does not contain image data, or if it contains image data in an unsupported format.
- If you downloaded this image from the Internet, the download may have terminated prematurely. Please try downloading the image again.
- If this image file came from a digital camera, scanner, or other image editing program, it's possible that PhotoDemon simply doesn't understand this particular file format. Please save the image in a generic format (such as JPEG or PNG), then reload it.

phrase.translation: Falsches Bild. Der Bildaufbau wird abgebrochen.

phrase.original: The specified file could not be located. If it was located on removable media, please re-insert the proper floppy disk, CD, or portable drive. If the file is not located on portable media, make sure that: 1) the file hasn't been deleted, and... 2) the file location provided to PhotoDemon is correct.

PhotoDemon cannot locate additional information for this error. That probably means this error is a bug, and it needs to be fixed!
Would you like to submit a bug report? (It takes less than one minute, and it helps everyone who uses the software.)

PhotoDemon has experienced an error. Details on the problem include:
Error number %1 Description: %2
%3

Thank you for submitting a bug report. To make sure your bug is addressed as quickly as possible, PhotoDemon needs you to answer one more question.
Do you have a GitHub account? (If you have no idea what this means, answer "No".)

PhotoDemon has automatically opened a GitHub bug report webpage for you. In the Title box, please enter the following error number with a short description of the problem: %1
Any additional details you can provide in the large text box, including the steps that led up to this error, will help it get fixed as quickly as possible.
When finished, click the Submit New Issue button. Thank you!

PhotoDemon has automatically opened a bug report webpage for you. In the Additional Details box, please describe the steps that led to this error.
In the bottom box of that page, please enter the following error number: %1
When finished, click the Submit button. Thank you!

phrase.translation: Zählen der Anzahl der Farben im Bild.

phrase.original: An error occurred while attempting to load %1. Please verify that the file is a valid custom filter file.
Unfortunately, the number of images you selected exceeds what Windows® allows for a single load operation. Please try again with a smaller set of selected images.
(Note: move the mouse over the histogram to calculate these values)
phrase.translation: (Hinweis: Bewegen Sie die Maus über das Histogramm für die Werte zu berechnen)

phrase.original: Analyzing image histogram for maximum and minimum values
phrase.translation: Die Analyse des Bildes Histogramm für maximale und minimale Werte

phrase.original:
If you do not save this macro, all actions recorded during this session will be permanently lost. Are you sure you want to cancel?

Abducting image and probing it for weaknesses
phrase.translation: Entführen Bild für das Eindringen und Schwächen

phrase.original: Accelerating to 88mph in order to antique-ify this image
phrase.translation: Beschleunigung bis 88 mph auf diesem Bild Rücklaufsperre

phrase.original: Engaging hipsters to perform sepia conversion
phrase.translation: Starten Hüfthose bis sepia Umwandlung durchzuführen

phrase.translation: Bild schlafen, dann messen die REM-Zyklen

phrase.original: Embuing image with the essence of F. Miller
phrase.translation: Penetrieren Bild mit dem Wesen der F. Miller

phrase.translation: Zählen die Anzahl der eindeutigen Farben in diesem Bild

phrase.original:
This menu item only appears in the Visual Basic IDE.
You can use the MenuTest() sub in the Filters_Miscellaneous module to test your own filters. I typically do this first, then once the filter is working properly, I give it a subroutine of its own.
(tool buttons will appear here in the near future...)

Support PhotoDemon with a small donation (thank you!)
Read PhotoDemon's license and terms of use
Update check postponed (a check has been performed in the last 10 days)
phrase.translation: Update-Prüfung verschoben (überprüft wird in den letzten 10 Tagen durchgeführt)

phrase.original: Checking for software updates (this feature can be disabled from the Tools -> Options menu)
An error occurred while checking for updates. Please make sure you have an active Internet connection.
phrase.translation: Ein Fehler beim Überprüfen auf Updates. Stellen Sie sicher, eine aktive Internet-Verbindung.

phrase.original: Software update found! Launching update notifier
phrase.translation: Software Update gefunden! Starten Update Benachrichtigung

phrase.original: Some core plugins could not be found. Preparing updater
phrase.translation: Einige Core-Plugins können nicht gefunden werden. Vorbereiten updater

phrase.original: Ignoring plugin update request per user's INI settings
phrase.translation: Ignorieren Plugin Update Anfrage pro Benutzer INI-Einstellungen.

phrase.original: An error occurred while checking for updates. Please try again later.
phrase.translation: Ein Fehler beim Überprüfen auf Updates. Bitte versuchen Sie es später erneut.

phrase.original: This copy of PhotoDemon is the newest available. (Version %1.%2.%3)

Thank you for submitting a bug report. To make sure your bug is addressed as quickly as possible, PhotoDemon needs to know where to send it.
Do you have a GitHub account? (If you have no idea what this means, answer "No".)
Preparing to load recent file entry

The selected scanner or digital camera isn't responding.
Please make sure the device is turned on and ready for use.

The scanner/digital camera interface plug-in (EZTW32.dll) was marked as missing upon program initialization.
To enable scanner support, please copy the EZTW32.dll file (available for download from http://eztwain.com/ezt1_download.htm) into the plug-in directory and reload the program.
Unknown error occurred. Please make sure your scanner is turned on and ready for use.
phrase.translation: Ein unbekannter Fehler ist aufgetreten. Achten Sie darauf, Ihren Scanner eingeschaltet ist und bereit für den Einsatz.

phrase.original: Scan successful, but temporary file save failed. Is it possible that your hard drive is full (or almost full)?
phrase.translation: Erfolgreiche Scan, sondern spart temporäre Datei fehlgeschlagen. Ist es möglich, dass Ihre Festplatte voll ist (oder fast voll)?

phrase.original: Unable to acquire DIB lock. Please make sure no other programs are accessing the scanner. If the problem persists, reboot and try again.
Temporary file access error. This can be caused when running on a system with limited access rights. Please enable admin rights and try again.
Scan canceled at the user's request.
phrase.translation: Scannen abgebrochen auf Antrag des Benutzers.

phrase.original: The scanner returned an error code that wasn't specified in the EZTW32.dll documentation (Error #%1). Please visit http://www.eztwain.com for more information.

phrase.translation: zersetzen mit der Verwendung dieser Werte

phrase.original: use this many shades of gray
phrase.translation: Verwenden Sie viele Schattierungen von Grau

phrase.original: Converting image to %1 shades of gray
Converting to %1 shades of gray, with dithering
Converting image to grayscale using %1 values
Tracing image edges with virtual paintbrush
Algorithm designed to present a clean, artistic prediction of image edges.
phrase.translation: Algorithmus entwickelt, um eine saubere, künstlerische Vorhersage der Bildränder zu präsentieren bieten.

phrase.original: Simple mathematical routine based on linear relationships between diagonal pixels.
phrase.translation: Einfache mathematische Routine auf lineare Beziehungen zwischen diagonalen Pixeln.

phrase.original: Advanced mathematical routine based on cubic relationships between diagonal pixels.
phrase.translation: Erweiterte mathematische Routine auf kubische diagonale Beziehungen zwischen Pixeln.

phrase.original: An error (#%1) has occurred. Compression halted.
File compressed from %1 bytes to %2 bytes. Ratio: %3 %
phrase.translation: Datei von %1 Bytes bis %2 Bytes komprimiert. Ratio: %3 %

phrase.original: File decompressed from %1 bytes to %2 bytes.
phrase.translation: Datei von %1 Bytes bis %2 Bytes dekomprimiert.

phrase.original: have PhotoDemon estimate the ideal threshold for this image
phrase.translation: PhotoDemon zeigt die ideale Schwelle Schätzung für dieses Bild

phrase.original: colors to use (click boxes to change)
dynamically update taskbar icon to match current image

While multitasking, some find it convenient to have the PhotoDemon task bar icon reflect the image currently being edited. This option allows PhotoDemon to automatically update the task bar and window icons as necessary.
The "Recent Files" menu width is limited by Windows. To prevent this menu from overflowing, PhotoDemon can display image names only instead of full image locations.
Image windows tend to be large, so feel free to display each image's full location in the image window title bars.
remember main window's on-screen location between sessions
If selected, this setting will ensure that PhotoDemon starts up in the on-screen location where you last left it.
draw drop shadow between image and canvas
This setting helps images stand out from the canvas behind them
render PhotoDemon text with modern typefaces (only available on Vista or newer)
This setting uses "Segoe UI" as the PhotoDemon interface font. Leaving it unchecked defaults to "Tahoma".
automatically validate all incoming alpha channels

When checked, this option allows PhotoDemon to automatically remove empty alpha channels from imported images. This improves program performance, reduces RAM usage, and improves file size on exported files.
save TIFFs as separated CMYK (for printing)
TIFFs support both RGB and CMYK color spaces. RGB is used by default, but if a TIFF file is going to be used in printed document, CMYK is sometimes required.
PNG interlacing is similar to "progressive scan" on JPEGs. Interlacing slightly increases file size, but an interlaced image can "fade-in" while it downloads.
preserve file's original background color, if available
PNG files can contain a background color parameter. This takes up extra space in the file, so feel free to disable it if you don't need background colors.
when saving, compress PNG files at the following level
use RLE encoding when saving TGA images
TGA files only support one type of compression. PhotoDemon can apply simple RLE encoding when saving TGA images.
use RLE encoding when saving 8bpp BMP images
when closing image files, warn me me about unsaved changes
Check this if you want to be warned when you try to close an image with unsaved changes
save behavior: overwrite vs make a copy
when using the "Save As" command, set the default file format according to
count unique colors in incoming images (to determine optimal color depth)

This option allows PhotoDemon to scan incoming images to determine the most appropriate color depth on a case-by-case basis (rather than relying on the source image file's color depth, which may have been chosen arbitrarily).
apply tone mapping to imported HDR and RAW images (48, 64, 96, 128bpp)
Tone mapping is used to preserve the tonal range of HDR images. This setting is very useful for RAW photos and scanned documents, but it adds a significant amount of time to the image load process.
load options for specific image types
if a file contains multiple images
automatically clear the active selection after "Crop to Selection" is used

When the "Crop to Selection" command is used, the resulting image will always contain a selection the same size as the full image. There is generally no need to retain this, so PhotoDemon can automatically clear it for you.
Use this to manually disable GDI+ support. This forces PhotoDemon to rely on its FreeImage and internal VB-only routines.
Click to open a browse-for-folder dialog
log all program messages to file

If this is checked, PhotoDemon will create a human-readable .log file that contains the text of every message displayed on the progress bar. This will increase processing time, so only check this option if you really need debugging data.
memory usage will be displayed here
run-time testing options (NOTE: these are not saved to the INI file)
if core plugins cannot be located, offer to download them
phrase.translation: Als Core-Plugins nicht gefunden werden kann, bietet zum herunterladen

phrase.original: PhotoDemon relies on three open-source plugins for full functionality. If they are missing, this will allow the software to automatically download them.
automatically check for software updates every 10 days
If this is disabled, you can visit tannerhelland.com/photodemon to manually download the latest version of PhotoDemon

Close the current image.
If the current image has not been saved, you will receive a prompt to save it before it closes.

Close the current image.
Because you have turned off save prompts (via Tools -> Options), you WILL NOT receive a prompt to save this image before it closes.

This action will reset all preferences to their default values. It cannot be undone.
Are you sure you want to continue?
default settings - CCITT Group 4 for 1bpp, LZW for all others
PKZIP DEFLATE (also known as zLib DEFLATE)
dynamically update taskbar icon to match current image (FreeImage plugin required)
to match the image file's original color depth
by asking me what color depth I want to use
save a new copy, e.g. "filename (2).jpg" (safe behavior)
the current file format of the image being saved
the last image format I used in the "Save As" screen
ask me how I want to proceed
load all the images in the file
render PhotoDemon text with modern typefaces
enable GDI+ support (do not enable this if gdiplus.dll is not available)
feature disabled due to missing plugin

NOTE: Some options on this page have been disabled because the FreeImage plugin is missing. To enable these options, please click on "Updates" and select "if core plugins cannot be located, offer to download them." Then restart the program and select "Yes" when prompted.
NOTE: Many of these file format options require the FreeImage plugin. Because you do not have the FreeImage plugin installed, these options may not perform as expected.
max PhotoDemon memory usage this session
Interface options include settings for the main PhotoDemon interface, including things like canvas settings, font selection, and positioning.
Load options allow you to customize the way image files enter the application.
Save options allow you to customize the way image files leave the application.
File format options control how PhotoDemon handles certain types of images.
Tool options currently include customizable options for the Selection Tool. In the future, PhotoDemon will gain paint tools, and those settings will appear here as well.
Transparency options control how PhotoDemon displays images that contain alpha channels (e.g. 32bpp images).
Update options control how frequently PhotoDemon checks for updated versions, and how it handles the download of missing plugins.
Advanced options can be safely ignored by regular users. Testers and developers may, however, find these settings useful.

PhotoDemon provides two non-essential features that require Internet access: checking for software updates, and offering to download core plugins (FreeImage, EZTwain, zLib, and pngnq-s9) if they aren't present in the \Data\Plugins subdirectory.
The developers of PhotoDemon take privacy very seriously, so no information - statistical or otherwise - is uploaded by these features. Checking for software updates involves downloading a single "updates.txt" file containing the latest software version number. Similarly, downloading missing plugins simply involves downloading one or more of the compressed plugin files from the PhotoDemon server.
If you choose to disable these features, note that you can always visit tannerhelland.com/photodemon to manually download the most recent version of the program.
WARNING: this folder is invalid (access prohibited). Please provide a valid folder. If no new folder is provided, PhotoDemon will use the system's default temp location.
Image is all one color. Autocrop unnecessary.
Image is already cropped intelligently. Autocrop abandoned. (No changes were made to the image.)
No active selection found. Crop abandoned.
Crop complete. (Note: the selected area was automatically unselected.)
phrase.translation: Crop abzuschließen. (Hinweis:. Der ausgewählte Bereich wird nicht automatisch ausgewählt)

phrase.original: Crop complete. Selection drawing mode changed to make selection visible.
phrase.translation: Crop abzuschließen. Wählen Zeichnung Modus geändert Auswahl sichtbar.

phrase.original: Please select a VB binary file to scan for images
phrase.translation: Wählen Sie ein VB Binärdatei für Bilder scannen

phrase.original: Scan complete. Please select an image to import.
phrase.translation: Scannen abgeschlossen. Wählen Sie ein Bild zu importieren.

phrase.original: Unfortunately, no images were found in %1. Please select a new file.
phrase.translation: Leider gibt es keine Bilder in %1 gefunden. Wählen Sie eine neue Datei.

phrase.original: %1 is unable to display this data. It may be from an incompatible version of Visual Basic, the source file may be corrupted, or the data may exceed 32k in size.
use custom background color (click colored box to change)
phrase.translation: benutzerdefinierte Hintergrundfarbe (klicken Sie auf farbigen Feld zu ändern)

phrase.original: note: DPI is read-only when "fit to page" is selected.

Print previewing requires the FreeImage plugin, which could not be located on this computer. To enable previewing, please go to Edit -> Preferences and select "check for missing plugins on program start." The next time you load PhotoDemon, it will offer to download this plugin for you.

phrase.translation: Senden Sie das Bild an den DruckerDrucker

phrase.original: %1 was unable to print the image. Please make sure that the specified printer (%2) is powered-on and ready for printing.
Image printed successfully. (Note: depending on your printer, additional print confirmation screens may appear.)
phrase.translation: Bild erfolgreich gedruckt. (Hinweis: Je nach Drucker erscheint keine zusätzliche Bestätigung Bildschirme.)

phrase.original: Thumbnail save failed (FreeImage returned blank handle). Please report this error using Help -> Submit Bug Report.
Apply the following macro to each image
phrase.translation: Integrieren Sie das folgende Makro für jedes Bild

phrase.original: Do not apply a macro. (Use this if you just want to convert file formats.)
phrase.translation: Macro nicht verarbeiten. (Verwenden Sie diese Option, wenn Sie nur wollen, um die Datei zu konvertieren.)

phrase.original: Add selected files to the batch list ->
phrase.translation: Fügen Sie die ausgewählten Dateien auf die Batch-Liste ->

phrase.translation: Speichern von Bildern in diesen Ordner
BildSchritt 5 - Wählen Sie Output Format des Bildes

phrase.translation: Optional fügen Sie Text an den Anfang der Datei-Namen

phrase.translation: Output Bilddateien sollten benannt werden mit

phrase.original: The following image files will be processed
Image Files (multi-select using Shift or Ctrl)
This is not a valid list of images. Please try a different file.
phrase.translation: Dies ist nicht ein gültiges Bild Liste. Probieren Sie eine andere Datei.

phrase.original: You have already created a list of images for processing. Would you like to replace the current list with the entries from this file? (Selecting 'no' will only append the entries from the file to the existing list.)

You haven't selected any image files. Please add one or more image files to the conversion list before attempting to save the list to file.
Note: this is done by using the tools under the "Step 1 - Select Source Images" label.

You haven't selected any image files. Please add one or more image files to the conversion list before continuing.
Note: this is done by using the tools under the "Step 1 - Select Source Images" label.
Please select a valid macro file (Step 3!).
phrase.translation: Bitte wählen Sie eine gültige Makrodatei (Schritt 3!).

phrase.original: When all steps are complete, press "OK" to begin. Note: depending on the number of images being processed, batch conversion may take a long time.
full download path (must begin with "http://" or "ftp://")

phrase.translation: Versuchen Sie, die Verbindung zum Internet

phrase.original: %1 could not establish an Internet connection. Please double-check your connection. If the problem persists, try downloading the image manually using your Internet browser of choice. Once downloaded, you may open the file in %1 just like any other image file.
phrase.translation: %1 konnte keine Internet verbindung machen. Bitte überprüfen Sie Ihre Verbindung. Wenn das Problem weiterhin besteht, versuchen Sie, das Bild manuell herunterladen über einen Internet-Browser Ihrer Wahl. Einmal heruntergeladen, können Sie die Datei in % öffnen, wie jede andere Bilddatei.

phrase.original: Verifying image URL (this may take a moment)
phrase.translation: Überprüfen der Image-URL (dies kann eine Weile dauern)

phrase.original: %1 could not locate a valid image at that URL. Please double-check the path. If the problem persists, try downloading the image manually using your Internet browser of choice. Once downloaded, you may open the file in %1 just like any other image file.

%1 lost access to the Internet. Please double-check your Internet connection. If the problem persists, try downloading the image manually using your Internet browser of choice. Once downloaded, you may open the file in %1 just like any other image file.
Image URL verified. Downloading image (%1 of %2 bytes received)

phrase.translation: Laden abgeschlossen. Überprüfung der Integrität von Dateien

phrase.original:
Unfortunately, %1 is preventing %2 from directly downloading this image. (Direct downloads are sometimes mistaken as hotlinking by misconfigured servers.)
You will need to download this image using your Internet browser of choice, then manually load it into %2.
I sincerely apologize for this inconvenience, but unfortunately there is nothing %2 can do about stingy server configurations. :(
This URL is not valid. Please make sure the URL begins with "http://" or "ftp://".
Please be respectful of copyrights when downloading images. Even if an image is available online, it may not be licensed for use outside a specific website. Thanks!
Yes. Download these files to the plugins folder.
Not right now, but please remind me later.
Not now, not ever. Do not prompt me again.
free, open-source library for optimizing portable network graphics (PNG files)
free, open-source interface for importing images from scanners and digital cameras
free, open-source compression library; required to decompress all other plugins
free, open-source library for importing and exporting a variety of image formats
Would you like PhotoDemon to download these plugins for you?
total download size of all plugins
Downloading file %1 of %2 (%3 of %4 bytes received)
Plugins could not be downloaded at this time. Carry on!
Automatic plugin download canceled. Plugin-related features disabled for this session.
Automatic plugin download canceled. Plugin-related features permanently disabled.

Thank you for using PhotoDemon. Unfortunately, one or more required plugins could not be located. PhotoDemon will still work without these plugins, but a number of features will be deactivated.
To improve your user experience, please connect to the Internet, then allow the program to automatically download the following free, open-source plugin(s)

Thank you for using PhotoDemon. Unfortunately, one or more required plugins could not be located. PhotoDemon will still work without these plugins, but a number of features will be deactivated.
To improve your user experience, please allow the program to automatically download the following free, open-source plugin(s)
Missing plugins detected. Generating download information (this feature can be disabled from the Tools -> Options menu)
Ready to download required plugins. Awaiting user permission
Unfortunately, %1 could not connect to the Internet. Please connect to the Internet and try again.
Due to an unforeseen error, %1 is postponing plugin downloading for the moment. Next time you run this application, it will try the download again. (Apologies for the inconvenience.)
All downloads successful. This screen will automatically close in three seconds.
Plugins downloaded successfully. To complete plugin setup, please restart the program.
%1 could not locate the plugin server. Please double-check your Internet connection. If the problem persists, please try again at another time.
%1 lost access to the Internet. Please double-check your Internet connection. If the problem persists, please try the download again at a later time.
Not now, not ever. Do not prompt me about future updates.
phrase.translation: Nicht jetzt, nicht immer. Frag mich nicht wieder für zukünftige Updates.

phrase.original: Not right now, but please remind me again in the future.
phrase.translation: Nicht jetzt, aber bitte erinnern mich wieder in die Zukunft.

phrase.translation: & Ja! Nimm mich auf die herunterladen-Seite.

phrase.translation: Möchten Sie die neue Version herunterladen?

phrase.original: To learn about the latest version before downloading it, please visit
phrase.translation: Um die neueste Version vor dem herunterladen zu lernen, besuchen Sie bitte

phrase.original: A new version of PhotoDemon is available!

The next time you launch the program, it will remind you about this software update.
Note: you can always manually download the latest version by visiting tannerhelland.com/photodemon.
Thanks for downloading the latest PhotoDemon update. Hope you enjoy it!
The final image will be %1 %3 wide by %2 %3 tall.
Failed to load layer from disk: invalid layer file specified.
Preparing GDI+ encoder for this filetype
Filetype not supported by FreeImage. Import abandoned.
phrase.translation: Dateityp nicht von FreeImage unterstützt. Import aufgegeben.

phrase.original: All frames will be loaded, per the user's request.
phrase.translation: Alle Rahmen werden durch Benutzeranforderung geladen.

phrase.original: All icons will be loaded, per the user's request.
All pages will be loaded, per the user's request.
phrase.translation: Alle Seiten geladen werden, jeder Benutzer Anfrage.

phrase.original: Only the first frame will be loaded, per the user's request.
phrase.translation: Nur das erste Bild geladen wird, gemäß dem Wunsch des Benutzers.

phrase.original: Only the first icon will be loaded, per the user's request.
Only the first page will be loaded, per the user's request.
phrase.translation: Nur die erste Seite geladen ist, eine Benutzeranforderung.

phrase.original: Ignoring extra images in the file, per user's saved preference.
phrase.translation: Ignorieren weitere Bilder in der Datei, eine gespeicherte Benutzereinstellungen.

phrase.original: Loading all images in the file, per user's saved preference.
phrase.translation: Laden alle Bilder in der Datei, die von Benutzereinstellungen gespeichert.

phrase.original: Importing frame # %1 from animated GIF file
Importing page # %1 from multipage TIFF file
High bit-depth RGB image identified. Checking for non-standard alpha encoding
phrase.translation: Hoher Bit-Tiefe RGB Bild identifiziert. Prüfung auf Nicht-Standard-alpha-Codierung

phrase.original: Tone mapping HDR image to preserve tonal range
Alpha found, but further tone-mapping ignored at user's request.
phrase.translation: Alpha gefunden, aber weitere Tone Mapping vom Benutzer Anforderung ignoriert.

phrase.original: No alpha found. Further tone-mapping ignored at user's request.
phrase.translation: Kein alpha gefunden. Weitere Tone Mapping vom Benutzer Anforderung ignoriert.

phrase.original: High bit-depth RGBA image identified. Tone mapping HDR image to preserve tonal range
High bit-depth RGBA image identified. Tone-mapping ignored at user's request.
phrase.translation: Hoher Bit-Tiefe RGBA Bild identifiziert. Tone Mapping wird vom Benutzer Anforderung ignoriert.

phrase.original: Import via FreeImage failed (couldn't create DIB).
phrase.translation: Import via FreeImage Failed (Could not DIB).
Anwendung neuer Temperatur auf das Bild

phrase.original: %1 is not a valid entry. Please enter a value between %2 and %3.
%1 is not a valid entry. Please enter a numeric value.
clamp them to the nearest available pixel
phrase.translation: klemmen Sie sie auf den nächsten verfügbaren Pixel

phrase.original: reflect them across the nearest edge
Adjusting hue, saturation, and luminance values
phrase.translation: Einstellen der Farbton, Sättigung und Helligkeit Werte

phrase.original: adjust size to fit rotated image
keep image at its present size
Rotating image (this may take a few seconds)
phrase.translation: laisser la toile dans sa taille actuelle

phrase.original: Arbitrary rotation requires the FreeImage plugin, which could not be located. Rotation canceled.
The FreeImage plugin is required for image rotation. Please go to Tools -> Options -> Updates and allow PhotoDemon to download core plugins. Then restart the program.
Repeat this action for all unsaved images (X in total)
Save the image before closing it
phrase.translation: Speichern Sie das Bild vor dem Schließen

phrase.original: Do not save the image (discard all changes)
phrase.translation: Nicht speichern Sie das Bild (alle Änderungen verwerfen)

phrase.original: %1 has unsaved changes. What would you like to do?

NOTE: if you click 'Save', PhotoDemon will save this image using its current file name.
If you want to save it with a different file name, please select 'Cancel', then use the File -> Save As menu item.
Because this image has not been saved before, you will be presented with a full Save As dialog.
phrase.translation: Da diese noch nicht gespeichert wurde, erhalten Sie ein Dialogfenster 'Speichern unter'.

phrase.original: If you do not save this image, any changes you have made will be permanently lost.
phrase.translation: Wenn das Bild nicht speichert alle Änderungen, die Sie vorgenommen haben, werden dauerhaft verloren.

phrase.original: Canceling will return you to the main PhotoDemon window.
phrase.translation: Abbrechen, wird Sie zu den wichtigsten Foto Dämon Fenster zurückzukehren.

phrase.original: Repeat this action for both unsaved images
phrase.translation: Wiederholen Sie für jede gespeicherte Bilder

phrase.original: Repeat this action for all unsaved images (%1 in total)
phrase.translation: Wiederholen Sie diesen Vorgang für alle nicht gespeicherten Bilder (%1 total)

phrase.original: always apply this action to multi-image files
phrase.translation: Meine Auswahl für Multi-Image-Dateien für die Zukunft

phrase.original: Load each page as its own image
%1 contains multiple pages (%2 in total). How would you like to proceed?
phrase.translation: %1 enthält mehrere Seiten (%2 insgesamt). Wie würden Sie vorgehen?

phrase.original: %1 is an animated GIF file (%2 frames total). How would you like to proceed?
phrase.translation: %1 ist eine animierte GIF-Datei (%2 Frames insgesamt). Wie würden Sie vorgehen?

phrase.original: Load each frame as a separate image
phrase.translation: Jeden Frame als neues Bild laden

phrase.original: This option will load every frame in the animated GIF file as an individual image.
phrase.translation: Diese Option, die jedes Bild in der animierten POISON-Datei als ein einzelnes Bild geladen.

phrase.original: This option will only load a single frame from the animated GIF file, effectively treating at as a non-animated GIF file.
%1 contains multiple icons (%2 in total). How would you like to proceed?
Load each icon as a separate image
This option will load every icon in the ICO file as an individual image.
This option will only load a single icon from the ICO file.
Load each page as a separate image
This option will load every page in the TIFF file as an individual image.
phrase.translation: Diese Option, jede Seite in der TIFF-Datei als ein einzelnes Bild geladen.

phrase.original: This option will only load a single page from the TIFF file.
phrase.translation: Diese Option wird nur geladen 1 Rahmen der TIFF-Datei.

phrase.original: Subsampling affects the way the JPEG encoder compresses image luminance. 4:2:0 (moderate) is the default value.
Waiting for user to specify JPEG export options
phrase.translation: Warten auf Benutzereingabe Spezifikationen für JPEG-Export Optionen

phrase.original: advanced settings require the FreeImage plugin
phrase.translation: erweiterten Einstellungen erfordern die Free Image plugin

phrase.original: Super compression, very poor image quality (256:1)
Waiting for user to specify JPEG-2000 export options
phrase.translation: Warten auf Benutzereingabe Spezifikationen für JPEG-2000 Export-Optionen
bitte. Wählen Sie die exportierte Farbtiefe

phrase.original: please choose an output color depth
phrase.translation: bitte. Wählen Sie eine Ausgabe Farbtiefe

phrase.original: Waiting for user to specify color depth
phrase.translation: Erwarten Angabe des Benutzers für die Farbtiefe
bitte. Wählen Sie die Transparenz der Schwelle

phrase.original: This image has a complex alpha channel. Before it can be saved as a paletted image (8bpp), the alpha channel must be simplified.
phrase.translation: Dieses Bild hat einen Alpha-Kanal-Komplex. Bevor es als Palette led Bild (8bpp) gespeichert werden kann, wird der Alpha-Kanal vereinfacht werden.

phrase.original: Waiting for user to specify alpha threshold
phrase.translation: Erwarten Angabe des Benutzers für alpha SchwelleSchwelle

phrase.original: Do not display this warning again
I understand the risks of running PhotoDemon in the IDE
You are running PhotoDemon inside the Visual Basic IDE. This is not recommended.

Please compile PhotoDemon before using it. Many features that rely on subclassing are disabled in the IDE, but some - such as custom command buttons - cannot be disabled without severely impacting the program's functionality. As such, you may experience IDE instability and crashes, especially if you close the program using the IDE's Stop button.
Additionally, like all other photo editors, PhotoDemon relies heavily on multidimensional arrays. Array performance is severely degraded in the IDE, so some functions may perform very slowly.
If you insist on running PhotoDemon in the IDE, please do not submit bugs regarding IDE crashes or freezes. PhotoDemon's developers can only address issues and bugs that affect the compiled .exe.
Use this to reset all plugin-related options to their default state. This action cannot be undone.
phrase.translation: Verwenden Sie diese Option, um alle Plugin-bezogene Optionen auf die Standardwerte zurück zu setzen. Diese Aktion kann nicht rückgängig gemacht werden.

phrase.original: analyze colors using YUV instead of RGB (slower, but higher quality)
phrase.translation: Analyse Farben mit YUV anstelle von RGB (langsamer, aber bessere Qualität)

phrase.original: when reducing alpha channels, attempt to preserve values of 0 and 255
phrase.translation: bei der Senkung von alpha Kanälen, versuchen die Werte von 0 und 255 zu erhalten

phrase.original: installed, enabled, and up to date
if pixels lie outside the image
phrase.translation: wenn Pixel außerhalb des Bildes sind
Simulation von Wellen auf der Bildebene

phrase.original: Dipping image in virtual wave pool
Peering at image through imaginary kaleidoscope
WARNING! This tool has been heavily optimized, but at high radius values it will still be quite slow inside the IDE. Please compile before applying or previewing any radius larger than 20.
phrase.translation: WARNUNG! Dieses Tool ist hoch optimiert, aber bei hohen Radius-Werte, ist es immer noch ziemlich langsam in der IDE. Und werden gebeten, für die Vorschau der Anwendung oder eines Radius größer als 20 kompilieren.

phrase.original: Analyzing image in preparation for smart blur
phrase.translation: Bild wird analysiert in Vorbereitung für smart blur
Anwenden von quadratischen Unschärfe auf das Bild

phrase.original: if pixels lie outside the corrected area
